ComicInfo.Title: Dichotomies!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Donald Blake performs surgery on a woman named Dalia who is part of a revolution in Cherron. Guest-starring Spider-Man!
An alien named the Mind-Bender is holding Thor hostage in demand for a bag lady rescued from the streets the previous night. With his innermost demons unleashed by the Mind-Bender's mind-blast, will a self-doubting Spider-Man be able to save the day once more?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:45:40. [Issue ID 36200]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
